程序包 users

类 UsersCollection

java.lang.Object
users.UsersCollection
所有已实现的接口:
DataCollection, DataSubscriber
public class UsersCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSubscriber, DataCollection
User collection class. It is a collection of users - used to store all users in the system pulled from web server.

  • 方法概要

    fills the list with the data from the json file by using one factor at a time

    searches for other type of entity from this entity (search for inline entities) Note: Each kind of entity has different factor to use for the search
    void update()

    • searchForEntity

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode searchForEntity​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String query) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      从接口复制的说明: DataCollection
      searches for other type of entity from this entity (search for inline entities) Note: Each kind of entity has different factor to use for the search
      指定者:
      searchForEntity 在接口中 DataCollection
      参数:
      userName - - a field value to be used for the filter - it must be unique like id
      query - - choose one from Query Enum, a correct path to query the data
      返回:
      - the entity that matches the filter
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • filterByOnFactor

      public java.util.ArrayList<TestingSite> filterByOnFactor​(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String value)
      从接口复制的说明: DataCollection
      fills the list with the data from the json file by using one factor at a time
      指定者:
      filterByOnFactor 在接口中 DataCollection
      参数:
      field - - the field name to be used for the filter
      value - - the value of the field to be used for the filter
      返回:
      - the list of entities that match the filter
